extraDescription: The project team is soliciting the services of a Business Analyst Current staffing capacity levels within Innovation, Information & Technology Branch are unable to complete this work given other competing priorities and the only alternative is to retain professional services
comments: This is a notice of the restatement of Contract 100002959 dated October 09, 2014. The contract was not captured by our financial system and the issue has been corrected since then. For a contract with task authorizations, the realized amount of the contract is contingent on the number of task authorizations issued and may be less than the amount proactively disclosed, dependent on the operational requirements of the department.
